Description:
Detects the creation of an executable with a system process name in folders other than the system ones (System32, SysWOW64, etc.).
It is highly recommended to perform an initial baseline before using this rule in production.


Author: Sander Wiebing, Tim Shelton, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Files With System Process Name In Unsuspected Locations
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (filepath="*\\AtBroker.exe" OR filepath="*\\audiodg.exe" OR filepath="*\\backgroundTaskHost.exe" OR filepath="*\\bcdedit.exe" OR filepath="*\\bitsadmin.exe" OR filepath="*\\cmdl32.exe" OR filepath="*\\cmstp.exe" OR filepath="*\\conhost.exe" OR filepath="*\\csrss.exe" OR filepath="*\\dasHost.exe" OR filepath="*\\dfrgui.exe" OR filepath="*\\dllhost.exe" OR filepath="*\\dwm.exe" OR filepath="*\\eventcreate.exe" OR filepath="*\\eventvwr.exe" OR filepath="*\\explorer.exe" OR filepath="*\\extrac32.exe" OR filepath="*\\fontdrvhost.exe" OR filepath="*\\ipconfig.exe" OR filepath="*\\iscsicli.exe" OR filepath="*\\iscsicpl.exe" OR filepath="*\\logman.exe" OR filepath="*\\LogonUI.exe" OR filepath="*\\LsaIso.exe" OR filepath="*\\lsass.exe" OR filepath="*\\lsm.exe" OR filepath="*\\msiexec.exe" OR filepath="*\\msinfo32.exe" OR filepath="*\\mstsc.exe" OR filepath="*\\nbtstat.exe" OR filepath="*\\odbcconf.exe" OR filepath="*\\powershell.exe" OR filepath="*\\pwsh.exe" OR filepath="*\\regini.exe" OR filepath="*\\regsvr32.exe" OR filepath="*\\rundll32.exe" OR filepath="*\\RuntimeBroker.exe" OR filepath="*\\schtasks.exe" OR filepath="*\\SearchFilterHost.exe" OR filepath="*\\SearchIndexer.exe" OR filepath="*\\SearchProtocolHost.exe" OR filepath="*\\SecurityHealthService.exe" OR filepath="*\\SecurityHealthSystray.exe" OR filepath="*\\services.exe" OR filepath="*\\ShellAppRuntime.exe" OR filepath="*\\sihost.exe" OR filepath="*\\smartscreen.exe" OR filepath="*\\smss.exe" OR filepath="*\\spoolsv.exe" OR filepath="*\\svchost.exe" OR filepath="*\\SystemSettingsBroker.exe" OR filepath="*\\taskhost.exe" OR filepath="*\\taskhostw.exe" OR filepath="*\\Taskmgr.exe" OR filepath="*\\TiWorker.exe" OR filepath="*\\vssadmin.exe" OR filepath="*\\w32tm.exe" OR filepath="*\\WerFault.exe" OR filepath="*\\WerFaultSecure.exe" OR filepath="*\\wermgr.exe" OR filepath="*\\wevtutil.exe" OR filepath="*\\wininit.exe" OR filepath="*\\winlogon.exe" OR filepath="*\\winrshost.exe" OR filepath="*\\WinRTNetMUAHostServer.exe" OR filepath="*\\wlanext.exe" OR filepath="*\\wlrmdr.exe" OR filepath="*\\WmiPrvSE.exe" OR filepath="*\\wslhost.exe" OR filepath="*\\WSReset.exe" OR filepath="*\\WUDFHost.exe" OR filepath="*\\WWAHost.exe") NOT (process_path="*C:\\Windows\\System32\\wuauclt.exe" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\explorer.exe" OR (process_path="*C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\msiexec.exe" (filepath="*C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe" OR filepath="*C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7-preview\\pwsh.exe")) OR (filepath="*C:\\Windows\\System32\\SecurityHealth\\*" filepath="*\\SecurityHealthSystray.exe" process_path="*\\SecurityHealthSetup.exe") OR (filepath="*C:\\$WINDOWS.~BT\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\$WinREAgent\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\System32\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\*" OR filepath="*C:\\Windows\\uus\\*") OR (process_path="*C:\\Windows\\system32\\svchost.exe" filepath="*C:\\Program Files\\WindowsApps\\*"))
